      • Badge

        public Badge​(int id,
             java.lang.String name,
             java.util.Date date,
             int classBadge,
             boolean tagBased,
             int userId)
        Create a badge with all the attributes (null possible)
        Parameters:
        id - The badge id
        name - The name of the badge
        date - The date on which the user obtained the badge
        classBadge - The class of the badge
        tagBased - The badge tag
        userId - The user id that owns the badge
